display_long_description:
Command iconic pirate ships of the early 18th century and experience life as a true sea captain, sailing freely across the open world.
Your journey begins in Nassau, the heart of pirate life. It serves not only as a safe harbor, but also as a city you can develop over time.
Engage in naval battles, build your fleet, recruit legendary captains, expand Nassau, and manage resources to support your life at sea.
The Pirate: Republic of Nassau is an open-world pirate game that gives players the freedom to shape their own destiny. Plunder merchant ships or become a trader yourself. Take on missions from governors and follow tavern rumors to discover hidden caves and unlock special missions such as prison breaks or bandit camp assaults.

● Experience immersive pirate ship sailing on the open sea.
● Master tactical naval combat by outsmarting your enemies, choosing the right ammunition, and setting deadly traps.
● Recruit historical captains and command their unique ships.
● Expand your fleet with iconic ships of the era. Upgrade and customize them to your needs.
● Build and develop Nassau, the free capital of the Pirate Republic.
● Harness a deep economic system to profit from trade and produce your own goods.
● Experience close-quarters combat in prison breaks and camp assaults using swords, knives, and bombs.
● Immerse yourself in treasure hunting through diving and cave exploration.
● Sail solo, compete in PvP, or play with friends in PvE.
